topic.title: Generating Documentation for WSDL Documents in a Custom Format

keywords.indexterm: Editing WSDL Documentsgenerate documentation for WSDL documents in a custom format

body.p: To obtain the default HTML documentation output from a WSDL document, uses an intermediary XML document to which it applies an XSLT stylesheet. To create a custom output from your WSDL document, edit this XSLT stylesheet or write your own one.The wsdlDocHtml.xsl stylesheet used to obtain the HTML documentation is located in the installation folder of , in the [OXYGEN_DIR]/frameworks/wsdl_documentation/xsl folder.The intermediary XML document complies with the wsdlDocSchema.xsd XML Schema. This schema is located in the installation folder of , in the [OXYGEN_DIR]/frameworks/wsdl_documentation folder.
When using a custom format, you can also copy additional resources into the output folder or choose to keep the intermediate XML files created during the documentation process.
